welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Carignan, Canada! This beautiful city is known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Carignan has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport handles all freight shipments and logistics.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bromont Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
